pages.text: After recieving a $(item)star piece$() by collecting a $(l:shooting_stars/intro_stars)shooting star$() in time, it has multible uses. You can make $(item)star dust$() and $(item)star stones$() out of it.$(br2)Another use for star pieces is, the possiblity to $(thing)infuse$() them. Simply hold the left mouse button for some seconds. This will cost you $(thing)3 XP levels$(), to be mindfull.
